quotes.quote: New Orleans food is as delicious as the less criminal forms of sin.

If there was no New Orleans, America would just be a bunch of free people dying of boredom.
I'm not sure, but I'm almost positive, that all music came from New Orleans.
New Orleans is a unique environment.
How did you fall in love with New Orleans? At once, madly. Looking back, sometimes I think it was predestined.
New Orleans is awake all night, and every night is a party.
America has only three cities: New York, San Francisco, and New Orleans. Everywhere else is Cleveland.
What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in New Orleans, goes home with you.
People don't live in New Orleans because it is easy. They live here because they are incapable of living anywhere else in the just same way.
People from New Orleans are extremely prideful.

I think New Orleans is the best city in the United States.
New Orleans is just a doggone fun place to be.
You knows dat in New Orleans is not morning 'til dee sun come up.
